info.name: Gmail - Remove logo on printer friendly page
info.description:
This style removes logo only on the printer friendly page.

--
To contact me via Twitter: @shigefumi
info.additionalInfo:
Apr 26 2012 : Fixed

Jan 3 2009 : Updated for important feedback. Thanks user 5428.

Sep 14 2008 : Remove email address (top right) too. Thanks user 8545 and user 6573.
note:
/* --- logo --- */
body > table:first-child img[src*="/images/logo"]
/* --- email address (top right) --- */
body > table:first-child b
/* --- both --- */
body > table:first-child

Jan 30 2008 : Updated for Google Apps Gmail. Thanks user 3165.
src^="/mail/help/images/logo" ---> src*="/images/logo"

Jul 18 2007 : Initial Release
